ygData.subject: Re: New smith stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: thank you for info. now a few question because i dont know this zone is it a new npc vendor or an old one with new stuff to sell ? that could be helpfull
ygData.messageBody:
thank you for info. now a few question because i dont know this zone is it a new npc vendor or an old one with new stuff to sell ? that could be helpfull
because we need to find the vendor of the banded gantlet mold.
this item surely exist because its used for the new shaman armor
quest. 8)
i have petition a gm to know if this mold have been implemented he
simply reply me that there are several problem with the new patch
and that he don t know it this item is already findable in the game.


Gdaor on karana server.

On 13 Oct 99, at 22:54, Bonecrkr wrote:

From: "Bonecrkr" <bonecrkr@...>

Well, there are new items for smiths to make since this mornings patch.
Time for people to collate our info on where, what and how much. So far, I
have uncovered 3 new items we can make. The molds are available from a
vendor near the entrance to Kaladim, in Butcher Block.
